mapper.select:
SELECT `time` AS `date` , city AS city , s.goods_id AS goods_id , activityId AS activity_id , activityName AS activity_name , sum(clickNum) stay_num , sss. NAME AS goods_name , sum(vistor) AS vistor , tu.merchant_id AS merchant_id , sum(orderCount) order_qty_total , sum(orderSuccCount) order_qty_succ , sum(goodsCount) goods_num , sum(cupponCount) coupon_num , sum(focusCount) concern_num , sum(pv) pv , sum(uv) uv , t.merchant_code AS seller_id FROM ( SELECT u1.time , goods. NAME , u3.goods_id AS goods_id , IFNULL(u7.vistorCount , 0) AS vistor , IFNULL(u6.clickNum , 0) AS clickNum , IFNULL(u1.pv , 0) AS pv , IFNULL(u2.uv , 0) AS uv , IFNULL(orderCount , 0) AS orderCount , IFNULL(orderSuccCount , 0) AS orderSuccCount , IFNULL(goodscount , 0) AS goodsCount , IFNULL(cupponCount , 0) AS cupponCount , IFNULL(u8.focusCount , 0) AS focusCount , IFNULL(area.city , '') AS city , u1.activity_id AS activityId , u1.merchant_id AS merchantId , u1.activity_name AS activityName FROM ( -- pv
SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_id , a.activity_name , a.merchant_code , a.good_name , count(0) AS pv , a.activity_id FROM( SELECT a1.game_user_id , a2.id AS merchant_id , date_format(a1.login_time , '%Y-%m-%d') AS time , a1.machine_code , a2.brand_name AS good_name , a1.merchant_code , a1.activity_id , a1.activity_name FROM inno72_game_user_life a1 LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant a2 ON a1.merchant_code = a2.merchant_code WHERE a1.merchant_code != '' AND a1.login_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND a2.is_delete = 0 ) a GROUP BY a.time , a.merchant_id , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name ) b ) u1 LEFT JOIN( -- uv
SELECT b.* FROM( SELECT a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name , a.activity_id , a.merchant_id , count(0) AS uv FROM( SELECT DISTINCT a1.game_user_id , date_format(a1.login_time , '%Y-%m-%d') AS time , a2.id AS merchant_id , a1.machine_code , a2.brand_name AS good_name , a1.merchant_code , a1.activity_id FROM inno72_game_user_life a1 LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant a2 ON a1.merchant_code = a2.merchant_code WHERE a1.merchant_code != '' AND a1.login_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) a GROUP BY a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name ) b ) u2 ON u1.machine_code = u2.machine_code AND u1.time = u2.time AND u1.merchant_code = u2.merchant_code LEFT JOIN( -- goodscount
SELECT a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name , a.good_id AS goods_id , count(0) AS goodscount FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time , '%Y-%m-%d') AS time , m.machine_code , mer.merchant_code , mer.brand_name AS good_namemer , og.goods_name AS good_name , og.goods_id AS good_id , o.inno72_activity_id FROM inno72_order o LEFT JOIN inno72_order_goods og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON o.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant mer ON o.merchant_id = mer.id WHERE o.goods_status = 1 AND o.goods_type = 1 AND o.order_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) a GROUP BY a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name ) u3 ON u1.machine_code = u3.machine_code AND u1.time = u3.time AND u1.merchant_code = u3.merchant_code LEFT JOIN( -- orderCount
SELECT a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name , count(0) AS orderCount FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time , '%Y-%m-%d') AS time , m.machine_code , mer.merchant_code , mer.brand_name AS good_name , o.inno72_activity_id FROM inno72_order o LEFT JOIN inno72_order_goods og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON o.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON og.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant mer ON g.seller_id = mer.id WHERE o.goods_type = 1 AND o.order_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) a GROUP BY a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name ) u4 ON u1.machine_code = u4.machine_code AND u1.time = u4.time AND u1.merchant_code = u4.merchant_code LEFT JOIN( -- orderSuccCount
SELECT a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name , count(0) AS orderSuccCount FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time , '%Y-%m-%d') AS time , m.machine_code , mer.merchant_code , mer.brand_name AS good_name , o.inno72_activity_id FROM inno72_order o LEFT JOIN inno72_order_goods og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON o.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON og.goods_id = g.id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant mer ON g.seller_id = mer.id WHERE o.goods_type = 1 AND og.`status` = 1 AND o.order_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} ) a GROUP BY a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name ) u10 ON u1.machine_code = u10.machine_code AND u1.time = u10.time AND u1.merchant_code = u10.merchant_code LEFT JOIN( -- cupponCount
SELECT a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name , count(0) AS cupponCount , a.inno72_activity_id FROM( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time , '%Y-%m-%d') AS time , m.machine_code , mer.merchant_code , mer.brand_name AS good_name , o.inno72_activity_id FROM inno72_order o LEFT JOIN inno72_order_goods og ON o.id = og.order_id LEFT JOIN inno72_coupon c ON c.id = og.goods_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine m ON o.machine_id = m.id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops s ON s.id = c.shops_id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant mer ON s.seller_id = mer.id WHERE o.goods_type = 2 AND o.goods_status = 1 AND o.order_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} AND c.id != '' ) a GROUP BY a.time , a.machine_code , a.merchant_code , a.good_name ) u5 ON u1.machine_code = u5.machine_code AND u1.time = u5.time AND u1.merchant_code = u5.merchant_code LEFT JOIN( -- clickNum
SELECT mytime AS time , h1.machine_code , seller_id , sum(h1.num) AS clickNum FROM( SELECT substr(h.time , 1 , 10) AS mytime , h.* FROM inno72_machine_info_log_hour h LEFT JOIN inno72_goods g ON h.goods_id = g.CODE AND g.use_type != 0 WHERE h.type = 4 ) h1 GROUP BY mytime , h1.machine_code , h1.seller_id ) u6 ON u1.machine_code = u6.machine_code AND u1.time = u6.time AND u1.merchant_code = u6.seller_id LEFT JOIN( -- vistorCount
SELECT h.machine_code , h.time , sum(h.num) AS vistorCount FROM( SELECT substr(time , 1 , 10) AS time , machine_code , num FROM inno72_machine_info_log_hour WHERE type = 1 ) h GROUP BY h.machine_code , h.time ) u7 ON u1.time = u7.time AND u1.machine_code = u7.machine_code LEFT JOIN( SELECT h.machine_code , h.time , h.seller_id , sum(h.num) AS focusCount FROM( SELECT substr(time , 1 , 10) AS time , seller_id , machine_code , num FROM inno72_machine_info_log_hour WHERE type = 2 ) h GROUP BY h.machine_code , h.seller_id , h.time ) u8 ON u1.time = u8.time AND u1.machine_code = u8.machine_code AND u1.merchant_code = u8.seller_id LEFT JOIN inno72_shops shops ON shops.seller_id = u1.merchant_id LEFT JOIN inno72_machine machine ON machine.machine_code = u1.machine_code LEFT JOIN inno72_locale l ON machine.locale_id = l.id LEFT JOIN inno72_admin_area area ON l.area_code = area.CODE LEFT JOIN inno72_goods goods ON u1.merchant_id = goods.seller_id ORDER BY `time` , u1.machine_code , goods.NAME ) AS s LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant t ON s.merchantId = t.id LEFT JOIN inno72_merchant_user tu ON tu.id = t.merchant_account_id LEFT JOIN inno72_goods sss ON sss.id = s.goods_id GROUP BY activityId , city , merchantId;
